description: Billie Ramos confesses to his boyfriend Brandon Wilde that he hooked up with his sister's boyfriend before she met him. Brandon is shocked about the news, but Billie tells him he's so happy that it didn't work out because he would have never met him. Brandon is touched by his words and the two start intensely kissing leading to passionate hard-core fucking! Crazy blow jobs, ass eating and ass pounding! These two boys show their love for each other by getting down and dirtier than ever! Letting each other know there is no cock better than this!
title: Confessions
